body_html:
@terrytangyuan ,
Can I make your suggestion in other pull request to keep this change simple?

According to your suggestion, I am trying to modify the code to use Estimator instead of TesorFlowEstimator, but it looks the class lacks functionality. Especially I cannot pass feed_fn to it, which is used in TensorFlowEstimator#fit.

I have sent a pull request to add the functionality (#4696). When it is accepted, I will proceed to modify the code to use Estimator.

According to your suggestion, I am trying to modify the code to use Estimator instead of TesorFlowEstimator, but it looks the class lacks functionality. Especially I cannot pass feed_fn to it, which is used in TensorFlowEstimator#fit.

body:
@terrytangyuan ,
Can I make your suggestion in other pull request to keep this change simple?

According to your suggestion, I am trying to modify the code to use `Estimator` instead of `TesorFlowEstimator`, but it looks the class lacks functionality. Especially I cannot pass `feed_fn` to it, which is used in [TensorFlowEstimator#fit](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/estimators/base.py#L254).

I have sent a pull request to add the functionality (#4696). When it is accepted, I will proceed to modify the code to use `Estimator`.
